Class BinaryTree<E>

java.lang.Object
BinaryTree<E>
Type Parameters:
E - Type of elements contained in the tree.
Direct Known Subclasses:
RotatableBinaryTree
public class BinaryTree<E> extends Object
Data structure consisting of nodes that may or may not have other nodes on their left and right.
